TopicTitle: You can choose a super power however the next to respond chooses a side effect.

Articles.Content:
SE: immortality

SP: The ability to control bees.

SE: The only thing they can do is attack you.

SP: Creating unexisting Revell/Zvezda/Tamiya/Italeri models and building them for your own

Edited October 2, 2022 by Aerodynamic Kerbal

SP I don't get that. 

SE Been impenetrable

SE: It's only towards the KV-2's 152mm cannon (Which hasn't been used in quite a while)

SP: Talking to fish

SE: The fish only insult your grandmother

SP: Talking to wish.com

SE That website don't exist 

SP Use Blueshift as KSP

SE You can only teleport TO someplace but cannot return in 10 yrs

SP Get an A+ or 100 points in every test

SE Can't have any friend because you're a nerd(that's me)

SP Unlimited burns

SE: all food you touch instantly burns. Even drinks.

SP: eldritch blast

050812042022

SE: You are among the crew of the USS Eldridge, and hear: "Three... Two... One... Blast!!!"

SP: Reading info from the sci-fi movie computer disk drives.

SE you can only read the drive from Hermes's computer, which means you can't even read a jpg picture. 

SP Infinite Pu239 for my toy nuclear reactor

Edited December 8, 2022 by Abel Military Services

SE:   Considering 1 pound of the dust can cause cancer in 2 million people...yeah, you just gave everyone cancer, which will end the human race.

SP:  Invisibility

SE you cease to exist

SP - Grow tactical nukes from my toy nuclear catapult.

SE- you vaporize your room

SP- Ability to run faster than the Flash (grant gustin version, the only and best modern take on the character)

024806142023

SE: You can run faster than the flash card, but it gets broken every time when you throw it.

SP: To roll dice predictably.

SE: yes but only two sided ones

SP: To colonize mars with the snap of my fingers

SE- you succeed in colonizing mars with face huggers and xenomorphs

SP- to thanos snap the universe

161206142023

SE: Everything snaps in half.

SP: Can shrink and remove the mass from anything then return it to its original size and mass whenever I want.

SE: the mass gets tripled each time you use the power and quintupled every time you dont use it.

SP: ability to control controls.

011606172023

SE: yes but only for PS-3 Controllers and the configuration gets messed up

SP: The Ability to make Ksp-2 Science Come faster

SE: you break ksp2 beyond repair

SP: pyromancy and cryomancy

194906222023

SE: You can't use them individualy, so they always cancel each other out.

SP: Immune to all disease.

SE: you are like Mr Burns, affected by all diseases to the point the cancel out

SP: to take on form of dread 

172706242023

SE: When ever you take on the form, everyone around can't stop laughing.

SP: Hyperfocus, I can get any task done in the shortest possible time.

SE: you are so hyper-focused your sense of time warps and tasks you think and feel are going quickly are in fact taking exceedingly long time periods. (Trivia this side effect is actually real, it comes packaged with adhd and its uh interesting to experience, ask me how i know lol)

SP: the ability to make anything rust at will

093509152023
